item.title: As G7 leaders meet, allies ask: Is Trump with us or against us?
item.description: The issue of trade tariffs for all G7 members remains a source of deep tension between allies and the U.S.

item.title: Trump Organization announces mobile plan, $499 smartphone
item.description: President Donald Trump and his businesses have rolled out numerous products during his political career, including watches, sneakers and Bibles.

item.title: Suspect Vance Boelter apprehended in Minnesota lawmakers shooting case
item.description: Boelter allegedly killed Minnesota Democratic state Rep. Melissa Hortman and her husband, Mark, in what appears to be a politically motivated shooting...

item.title: Israel claims 'full aerial superiority' over Tehran's skies as strikes wage on
item.description: Investors have been weighing the odds of further escalation in the conflict and spillover into the broader oil-rich Middle East.

item.title: Europe is trying to woo Southeast Asia — but it won’t win it over the U.S. or China
item.description: "Relationships are built on economic ties in Southeast Asia, more than anything else," Teneo's Bob Herrera-Lim said.
